title: Invalid Password Message Display
description: Verify that an invalid password message is displayed when a user attempts to log in with an incorrect password.

steps.expected_result: The login button should be visible.
The username input field should be visible.
The username 'testuser' should be entered into the username field.
The password 'wrongpassword' should be entered into the password field.
The login attempt should be submitted.
The error message should contain the text 'Invalid password'.
The error message should be visible on the screen.

final_result: The error message 'Invalid password' should be visible when a user enters an incorrect password.
design_decisions: The test navigates to the login page and attempts to log in with an incorrect password to trigger the error message. CSS selectors with data-test attributes are used for reliable element targeting. The test checks for the presence and visibility of the error message to ensure the application handles invalid passwords correctly.
